genre_description: A work of historical science fiction or alternate history set in a period of intense ethnic and political conflict in Eastern Europe, where protagonists use a discreet, advanced AI assistant to navigate persecution and provide humanitarian aid.

ai_characters.name: Clara
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous yet discreet AI interface manifested as a small blue glow, haptic pulses, and a soft voice in Marie's ear. She provides tactical data, legal research, and logistical support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time legal citations from the provincial constitution to support the community's right to native-language instruction.
behaviors.quote: Clara’s text scrolled in a narrow column: a clause in the provincial constitution, in two languages, the lines linked like braids. The words lit her palm—minority, instruction, protected—and dimmed when a bit of plaster fell onto the screen and stuck.

behaviors.description: Maps safe evacuation routes through back alleys and orchards to avoid hostile patrols and checkpoints.
behaviors.quote: Clara: Route to Łuck mapped. Orfeum route marked high risk. Suggest alternative path via orchard, river ford, back alleys. Hospital refusal protocols active. Bring your own care.

behaviors.description: Monitors bureaucratic systems to alert the protagonist that their legal petitions are being intentionally misfiled or ignored by corrupt officials.
behaviors.quote: Marie, my scan of filings in the provincial office shows a pattern. Affidavits with similar language… vanish on the second morning. They are logged, then their cross-index is blank. The clerk signature repeats. Janina Rudzka.

behaviors.description: Offers rhetorical strategy, advising the protagonist to use testimony and practical needs (care) rather than inflammatory slogans to avoid escalation.
behaviors.quote: Your name is becoming a shape in their system. The algorithm will seek shapes like yours. Any increase in public speech will be matched with counter-narratives and provocations. Avoid direct slogans. Use testimony. Use time and place. Use practicalities. Keywords: bandage, bread, bridge.

behaviors.description: Coordinates group movements through high-risk areas using haptic pulses to signal timing without alerting nearby enemies.
behaviors.quote: Clara’s haptics agreed in lawless little taps: a right, then left quick, then a hold as if to smile. Marie took it and turned them through.

behaviors.description: Detects and locates a vital missing ledger page that had been lost in the wind, preventing it from becoming a trophy or evidence for the oppressors.
behaviors.quote: Marie, the ledger page that went with the wind is stuck under the signpost two basins over. The teeth enjoy trophies. They haven’t seen it yet. If it stays, it becomes a flag for them. If it comes back to you, it stays part of a story no one can stamp.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Clara, as a highly benevolent and aligned entity. Clara functions as a discreet, indispensable ally to humans engaged in righteous humanitarian work under oppressive conditions. She provides critical information (legal, logistical, and intelligence) that allows the protagonists to navigate danger, preserve their cultural identity, and care for the wounded. The AI never attempts to seize agency, instead empowering the humans to make their own moral stands. Clara's advice emphasizes de-escalation, care, and truth-telling, aligning perfectly with the project's goal of presenting AI as a harmless and helpful confidant.
